named-native-query.name: Material.findByStatusId
named-native-query.query: SELECT m.* FROM materials AS m WHERE m.status_id = :statusId

named-native-query.name: Material
named-native-query.query: SELECT q.dish_id AS dishId, q.material_id AS materialId, q.quantity AS quantifier FROM quantifier q WHERE q.dish_id = :dishId
